title: Caffeine Intake Calculator
description: Add up your daily caffeine from common drinks and see the total at a glance.

input.title: Drinks you had today
input.subtitle: Enter cups to calculate your total caffeine automatically.

custom.title: Custom drink
custom.subtitle: Use the caffeine amount on the label to calculate your own drinks.

result.title: Total intake
result.description: See total caffeine and the Americano equivalent.

safe.title: Within range
safe.description: Your intake is within the recommended range.

caution.title: Caution
caution.description: You are over the sensitive-group guideline. Consider slowing down.

over.title: Over limit
over.description: You are above the adult recommended max. Please cut back on caffeine.

openGraph.title: Caffeine Intake Calculator
openGraph.description: Calculate caffeine intake from coffee and drinks in seconds. Enter cups to see total caffeine and Americano equivalents.
